description: This file contains a comprehensive PostgreSQL database schema setup for a team status reporting application. It includes extension setup, enum types, table definitions for users, teams, reports, report items, reviews, activities, roles, permissions, and auxiliary tables such as AI summaries and export history. Additionally, it sets up triggers for timestamp management, indexes for performance, and views for recent report summaries.

methods.name: set_timestamp()
methods.description: A trigger function used across multiple tables to automatically update the 'updated_at' timestamp on row modifications.

calls: CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS pgcrypto
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS citext
